column5: I'll be spending a week up there and am interested in any info you guys have on this lake and of course...the fishing. I'll be bringing my boat.
Go to http://www.sportfishingbc.com go to the chatroom then message board lots of good guys there someone may help you there. NMhttp://www.xtremesportfishing.com/forum

The best website for fishing info in BC BAR NONE is www.fishbc.com Go there and there is guaranteed to be people able to answer your question. If you register you can probably even find info by doing a search. Good luck!
